    • knuthLayoutHelper

      public static void knuthLayoutHelper​(java.util.ArrayList<TreeSVGRenderer.TreeItem> treeItems, int position, int depth)
      Recursive helper method for creating trees with Knuth's algorithm Based on: https://llimllib.github.io/pymag-trees/
      Parameters:
      treeItems - Array of tree items (assumed to represent complete binary tree)
      position - current position
      depth - current depth

      Returns:
      String representing tree, with appropriate lines and spacing

      Display error message for an operation along with expected state of PQ after operation
      Parameters:
      before - state of PQ before operation
      operation - operation that triggered error
      expected - expected state of PQ after operation
      after - actual state of PQ after operation

      java.io.IOException - file write
